Macro golf is a game consisting of courses which each have 8 holes. With each hole, you need to hit the ball through it so that it sinks in the hole. You need to navigate the ball around the course, to sink it in the hole to move onto the next one. This game also includes local multiplayer.

In 1985 N.O.M.A.D. pushed the boundaries of what the 8-bit computers of the day could achieve with both their graphics and their gameplay. A fast-paced, all-out action shoot ’em up, this retro classic still retains a fan base to this day.
Purchase to obtain: Bunny's Band Chest (Joan), Crystal Princess Chest (Isabella), Cute Lady Chest (Xiao Qiao)

One day in the afterlife, a fierce fight broke out between demons for the right to rule the throne. Due to demon infighting, a rift opened up in the afterlife, turning the country of Raine into ruins. Now the Silver Cats guild is trying to restore the ruined world to its former state.

Nombre: 怪盗探偵ブロンドレディ
Descripcion: The Phantom Thief Detective Blonde Lady" is a girlslove novel and platformer 2Daction game in which a beautiful thief and a detective fight and get along with each other! Control the thief to wade through traps, steal treasure chests, and escape from the detective who is closing in on you!
In this DLC you will find 70 wallpapers from the game. They are in the artbook folder in the folder with the game, including those that were not included in the original version. Enjoy

Adapt to stay alive as the Climate swings from Scorching Hot to Freezing Cold, and Events such as Volcanoes and Meteorites alter the landscape and force new strategies.

Nombre: Cyber NINJA that Climbs the City
Descripcion: You, the NINJA, have to climb up the skyscrapers of Cyber Tokyo using your grapple, while destroying the Tokyo cops with your Katana and Beam Gun! Play simple run of three stages aiming for the top of the Cyber Tower of Tokyo!

Unleash the fusion of classic Chess strategy and electrifying card game mechanics. Navigate a familiar board with the unpredictability of your card deck. Choose your moves, strategize your plays, and outwit opponents in this riveting blend of tactics and chance. Ready for the ultimate duel?

Ad Victoriam lets you experience large scale immersive battles and lead Caesar's legions to victory in a groundbreaking simulator! You can start up custom battles or play a full strategy game as you conquer Gaul and establish the Roman Empire!
You are a single ship outnumbered and outgunned by the enemy fleet. The one advantage you have is a powerful magnet that is capable of capturing the enemy bullets and firing them back at the enemy!
Rider, skateboarder extraordinaire, is about to embark on a journey across the solar system after a catastrophic event sets him on a course to save us all.
A 3D third person narrative exploration game, set in a frozen wasteland where an ancient civilization fell. Centered around movement puzzles and dealing with environment mechanics.
A 3D isometric action-adventure game where the player must use different abilities throughout the game to defeat enemies and solve puzzles.
This is an RPG survival game You will play a human in the zombie world, to survive and fight
Rumble and smash! Cube Clash is an online fighting game in which you can pick a unique historically and pop-culture inspired cube fighter and smash your friends in sequences of one-hit rounds games.
One Thousand and One Shooting. Cultivate magic, sell it off, and make a profit! you can choose your character!

Prepare for an enthralling journey as you step into the mesmerizing voxel art world of "Breached." This roguelite twin-stick shooter seamlessly marries the thrill of rapid-fire combat with the nuanced strategy of rogue-inspired gameplay, creating a gaming experience like no other.

Casting Whispers is a story-driven first-person horror mystery in the fictional New England industrial city of Corburgh. Investigate the run-down apartment building that your mentor seems to have vanished in, while an alien interdimensional being vies for your attention and, possibly, your life.
Welcome to "Paper Arcade: Match-3 RPG Edition"! Get ready to embark on an epic adventure filled with magical gems, powerful spells, and thrilling battles.
Grab The Goblins! is a cute hidden object game where you need to find tiny goblins to stop them running amok!
Welcome to "Paper Arcade: Singing Sparrow Edition"! Get ready to flap your wings and test your reflexes in this addictive game of skill and timing.
《英雄之旅》是一款放置挂机类游戏，核心玩法就是打怪刷装备，穿更好的装备打更强的怪，体验爆极品装备的快感。你可以通过搭配技能和天赋，挑战竞技场和罪魂之塔，解锁神器，获得强大的能力。此外，你还可以收集各种伙伴、图鉴和幻化，让你的冒险更加多彩。

"True Maze Defiance" is a thrilling game where you navigate a ball through a challenging maze, collecting diamonds and avoiding obstacles. Its unique control system, which uses mouse tilting, adds to the excitement and immersion. With engaging gameplay and increasing difficulty.
